item.title: Home Screen Quick Actions With SwiftUI
item.author: michael-collins
item.description: Home Screen quick actions are a great way to expose common actions that your customers perform using your application. When SwiftUI 2 was released, there was surprisingly little said about how to implement quick actions in new applications. I will show you how to use custom scene delegates to support Home Screen quick actions in your SwiftUI apps.
